mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_AVAILABLE_TIME ( OPERATING_HOURS_NO, RESERVATION_START_TIME, RESERVATION_END_TIME ) VALUES ( (SELECT OPERATING_HOURS_NO FROM TB_OPERATING_HOURS WHERE WEEKDAY = #{weekDay} AND RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} ), #{startTime}, #{endTime} )

INSERT INTO TB_RESERVATION_SETTING ( RESTAURANT_NO, INTERVAL, MAX_NUM, MIN_NUM, MAX_TEAM_NUM, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( #{restaurantNo}, #{interval}, #{maxNum}, #{minNum}, #{maxTeamNum}, #{description} )
mapper.select: SELECT AT.OPERATING_HOURS_NO operatingHoursNo, OH.RESTAURANT_NO restaurantNo, OH.WEEKDAY weekDay, AT.RESERVATION_START_TIME reservationStartTime, AT.RESERVATION_END_TIME reservationEndTime FROM TB_AVAILABLE_TIME AT RIGHT JOIN TB_OPERATING_HOURS OH ON (OH.OPERATING_HOURS_NO = AT.OPERATING_HOURS_NO) WHERE OH.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo}

SELECT RESTAURANT_NO restaurantNo, INTERVAL interval, MAX_NUM maxNum, MIN_NUM minNum, MAX_TEAM_NUM maxTeamNum, DESCRIPTION description FROM TB_RESERVATION_SETTING WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AVAILABLE_TIME SET ( RESERVATION_START_TIME = #{reservationStartTime}, RESERVATION_END_TIME = #{reservationEndTime} ) WHERE OPERATING_HOURS_NO = SELECT OPERATING_HOURS_NO FROM TB_OPERATING_HOURS WHERE WEEKDAY = #{weekDay} AND RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo}
UPDATE TB_RESERVATION_SETTING SET ( INTERVAL = #{interval}, MAX_NUM = #{maxNum}, MIN_NUM = #{minNum}, MAX_TEAM_NO = #{maxTeamNum}, DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} )
